Class Coordinator

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
        • components.Coordinator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.interfaces.CyPhyComponentI
    public class Coordinator
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
    The class Coordinator implements the components that act as the coupled model and coordinator of the global simulator in the smart grid example.

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2020-01-20

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
